Title: Allows water authorities to make certain purchases and to contract for certain services
Summary: Allows water authorities to make certain purchases and to contract for certain services through the use of U.S. and state agency and political subdivisions for advertising bids.
LawCode: Amd ยง103, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to including water authorities to make certain purchases and to contract for certain services through the use of U.S. and state agency and political subdivisions
